skins.shipDescription: Lights! Camera! Albacore! Ahaha, don't worry about it, I'm just getting fired up over here! Oh, did you come up with a better idea? Tell me, tell me~
skins.selfIntroduction: Here comes Albacore, submarine-slash-idol! I'm unique, I'm in the groove, so make some noise as I perform for you! Vocals, dancing, you name it, I can do it!
skins.acquisition: Lights! Camera! Albacore! Ahaha, don't worry about it, I'm just getting fired up over here! Oh, did you come up with a better idea? Tell me, tell me~
skins.login: Morning there, P! Let's make the most of today!
skins.details: My new gig must leave me with little time to play pranks? Haha, my friend, a true idol can perform AND play pranks, too! If you want an example, look no further than Sara!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Surprise! How's my new stage prop look?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Most of the stuff we're wearing was brilliantly handmade by Dido! Curious about that doll she's got, though. What's it represent?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I wanna see Taihou's concern in person! We should totally set some time aside for that!
skins.secretaryTouch: I wouldn't be here without your support!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I wonder what'd happen to you if I were to scream "I'm being molested!" right now... Wanna find out? Heheheh~
